definition: to feast one's eyes
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
to eat till full/satisfied
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
good fortune/happiness/luck
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: Yet its large TFT display is a feast for the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它的大TFT顯示屏真是讓人大飽眼福。

sentences.english: The tour of Guilin glutted my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 桂林一遊使我大飽眼福。

sentences.english: Well, let's move on to today's Feast for the Eyes.
sentences.chinese: 好了，一起來進入我們今天的賞心悅目大飽眼福吧。

sentences.english: The authors' narration to various sports activities will surely make readers feast their eyes.
sentences.chinese: 作者對各種體育運動的敘述定會令讀者大飽眼福。

sentences.english: The audience feasted their eyes on the wonderful performance.
sentences.chinese: 精彩演出讓觀衆大飽眼福。

sentences.english: As of Saturday, all you need is an Internet connection.
sentences.chinese: 如果是週六，你只需上網就可大飽眼福。

sentences.english: Jordan gave the audience a treat with a flurry of high-flying dunks.
sentences.chinese: 喬丹一連串的高空扣籃令觀衆大飽眼福。

definition: the eye cannot take it all in (idiom); too many good things to see/a feast for the eyes
(idiom) to gasp in amazement/to acclaim as the peak of perfection
out of the ordinary
to click one's tongue in wonder (idiom)/to be astonished
lit. slap the table and shout with praise (idiom); fig. wonderful!/amazing!/great!
to exclaim in admiration/a gasp of surprise
to envy/to admire
to love sth too much to part with it (idiom); to fondle admiringly
to exclaim in admiration
to return from a rewarding journey
joy of first experience (idiom)/the pleasure of reading sth for the first time
to be intensely proud of sth (idiom)
(idiom) fully displaying one's capabilities
to start sth new or original (idiom); to break a new path/to break fresh ground
to praise without cease (idiom); praise sb to high heaven
display counter/stand/booth
